title: Slick Retro Font - ID help
content:
Any ideas on this one? have hunted high and low, have come close but no cigar.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819171428im_/http:/typophile.com/files/964290_10201402354969187_1003463912_o_6374.jpg)
author: Carl M

comments.content: Reminds me of Doyald Young [Home Run](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819171428/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/doyald-young/home-run) and [Eclat](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819171428/http:/www.fonts.com/font/image-club/eclat). [Lobster](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819171428/http:/www.impallari.com/lobster) is also in the same vein.
Eclat it is, well done. Many thanks indeed!
